name: MaskMan Infinity (Remake)
description:
MaskMan Infinity is a plataforms endless game in which you are MaskMan! and you have to eat the most fruits posible untill DIE.  This is a remake in Open Beta, this because I want feedback, that for all

Psdt:The Blue Rifths  can do 5 things randomly, +1 fruits, +10 fruits, +1 heart, -1 heart and DEATH
